Title: The Big Scary U
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (based on the series of graphic novels by), Tony Moore (based on the series of graphic novels by), Charlie Adlard (based on the series of graphic novels by), David Leslie Johnson-McGoldrick (teleplay by), Angela Kang (teleplay by), Scott M. Gimple (story by), David Leslie Johnson-McGoldrick (story by), Angela Kang (story by)
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, Lauren Cohan, Chandler Riggs
Plot: A close look at Negan and the lives of the Saviors during the conflict through a familiar set of eyes.
